pr_title: Add generic Set support to streams

timeline.message:
Add generic Set support to streams

This commit adds support for reading and writing sets as generic values
in stream input and output.

closes #54708

timeline.author: original-brownbear

timeline.bodyText: I think you can just make this readSet(StreamInput::readGenericValue)?
timeline.author: original-brownbear

replies.bodyText: It could work for the HashSet version, but I think it is good to have the symmetry with with the LInkedHashSet above.
replies.author: rjernst
